data.eml:eml: A blue-eyed Leptobrachium (Anura: Megophryidae) from Arunachal Pradesh, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sondhi, Sanjay, Ohler, Annemarie (2011): A blue-eyed Leptobrachium (Anura: Megophryidae) from Arunachal Pradesh, India. Zootaxa 2912: 28-36, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204598
